jobDescription: HR Data Analyst Location: Mountain View, CA  Duration: 8 months Description:Overview: Play a key analytic role supporting with the aim of enhancing the effectiveness of the People Operations function. Your work will be a blend of evaluation research and reporting.  For the reporting work, you will support inquiries from users for data/information. You will also contribute to the development of and training on dashboards that will enable more self-service in the future. This will include working with databases, pulling and transforming data, gathering and validating requirements and building or advising on the development of dashboards.  For the evaluation research, your work will be multifaceted. You will advise program managers on how to apply evaluation strategies. You will also assess the health of the existing evaluation system and make recommendations for how it can be improved. You also may play a direct role developing and conducting evaluations of critical programs - forming hypotheses, gathering and analyzing data, drawing conclusions and sharing with key stakeholders in ways that help them take action on the findings. Top 3 Daily Responsibilities: Pulling and transforming data for reports  Advising on the requirements for dashboard user needs to enable more self-service in the future  Contributing to program evaluation research Requirements:
